statement.title: Content
Standard Input
statement.content: there is one numbers $N$, the number of '7' that you have$(1 \leq N \leq 1000)$.

statement.title: Standard Output
statement.content: if you can get '24' with N '7',than output "YES"(without quote), if you can't do it, output "NO".

statement.title: Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
1NO
2NO
6YES
